title: Continuation of provisions for maintaining of a Residential Care Home for the children profoundly disabled by Autism and Autism related Disorders
decision_details: - a Trust named as the 'Udapadi Trust' has been established in 2003 by a group of parents of the above category of children to meet the needs of these children to a certain extent.  The objective of this Trust is to maintain residential homes for mentally retarded children, provision of funds for residential, social welfare and for recreation facilities etc. of these children.  On a proposal made by Hon. Felix Perera, Minister of Social Services, Cabinet approval was granted to provide Rs.1.5 million to this Fund in 2011 in quarterly installments.  Action will be taken by the Ministry to provide funds for the purpose from the year 2012 onwards through United Nations and other International  Organizations assisting Child Development Charity Institution.  A Ministerial Committee comprising of the Ministers of Health; Education; Social Services; and Child Development and Women's Affairs was appointed to study the problems and make recommendations to the Cabinet on mobilizing resources to assist this category of  children.
